title: Separate language-specific functions into dedicated files
description:
The file src/utils/codeUtils.ts contains mixed concerns - general utilities and language-specific functions. This makes the code harder to maintain and organize. Create separate files for language-specific functions like:

- fixHtmlJsxSpacing → create htmlJsxUtils.ts
- Language-specific parameter configuration → languageConfig.ts

This follows the Single Responsibility Principle and improves code organization.
